Name: Need For Drink
About the game: A 5-minute registration on the most famous dating website. 10 seconds waiting for the perfect match algorithm to search. A short dialog with your perfect match. A 30-minute date after a hard work day. Some other rash decisions… Marriage. “Need For Drink” is a casual multiplayer game about competition between the spouses: a drunkard husband and his brawler wife. Current features: Several different single-player and multiplayer game modes. 2 playable characters. Funny gameplay A beautiful location. Many different types of alcohol to drink or break. Many different types of foods to munch on. Lots of comedic voice lines A chance to meet new people
